plot: A splendid travelogue, showing the wildest scenes of the majestic valley of the Colorado River. The valley where the human voice may be heard over fourteen miles away.
title: The Grand Canyon
plot_es: A splendid travelogue, showing the wildest scenes of the majestic valley of the Colorado River. The valley where the human voice may be heard over fourteen miles away.
